file_content.text: The troops are still talking about what you did on Balmorra. The Republic owes you one.
There's no telling what power the Empire could gain on Balmorra. We have to retake the planet.
Between all of you, there's enough power to bring down the Imperial Army. You have to help us.
I'm sorry to detain you, Master Jedi, but this is an emergency.
Lieutenant Hollis, sir. We have a situation.
I can promise a boatload of credits if you're for hire.
You saved those refugees at Valence Station, right? We need a fighter like you.
We're trying to break an Imperial occupation on Balmorra. But the Republic's got no ground, no resources and right now, no chance.
The Republic's made up of worlds that didn't have a chance.
Never stopped us before.
History hasn't exactly been repeating itself lately. The stakes are too high here.
Sometimes it's the attitude that wins the war.
You should be more optimistic.
Good morale won't give us a better position. The Empire's got their grip, and they're not letting go.
Whoever said you had a future in recruiting lied.
That's no way to boost morale.
I've been given permission to speak frankly. And frankly, we're desperate, sir.
I have a habit of being in the wrong place at the wrong time.
Just my luck.
I don't think "wrong" is the right word. The Republic needs help now more than ever.
What does the Empire want with Balmorra?
An Imperial occupation?
This is everyone's problem. Getting Balmorra out of the Empire's hands is critical.
Balmorran factories produce the most powerful weapons in the galaxy. Possess them, win any war you want.
The Republic must retake Balmorra. But we need reinforcements.
Is Balmorra a complete war zone?
Where do I start?
Bring down the Empire's defenses. Make it a fair fight.
If it's credits you want, you'll get them. Or whatever else is worth more to you than Republic victory.
We've managed to make a beachhead in a place called Bugtown that the Empire overlooked.
Commander Madine requested all reinforcements see him at Republic headquarters. Can he expect you?
I believe the Empire's worn out their welcome.
The occupation must end.
From the stories I hear, I think the Balmorran people would agree.
If Balmorra's as important as you say, I don't mind being drafted.
Count this soldier in.
Believe me, I hope my recruiting career ends with you.
Long odds and small chances are what I do best.
This is my kind of job.
It's not a lost cause yet. But I'm glad I caught a specialist.
I'll inform the commander. You'd better get on board. Good luck.
You can't be serious. This could mean war! You're just going to walk away?
Unless you're looking for the shuttle, stay clear of the landing pad.
Hold that shuttle!
That doesn't concern me.
Not following.
Don't look at me.
If I get bored, sure.
Not today. [Refuse quest]
